aboutIpfs.header: What is the Space Data Network?
aboutIpfs.paragraph1: <0><0>A decentralized data platform</0> built on IPFS that gives you sovereign control over your data with HD wallet-based identity and end-to-end encryption</0>
aboutIpfs.paragraph2: <0><0>A peer-to-peer network</0> where nodes discover each other, share data, and communicate without central servers or single points of failure</0>
aboutIpfs.paragraph3: <0><0>A cryptographic identity system</0> — your HD wallet derives signing and encryption keys, giving you a portable identity that you own and control</0>
aboutIpfs.paragraph4: <0><0>Content-addressed storage</0> — files are identified by their content hash, making them tamper-proof, cache-friendly, and globally distributable</0>
aboutIpfs.paragraph5: <0><0>An extensible plugin system</0> for building decentralized applications and services on top of a robust peer-to-peer foundation</0>

welcomeInfo.paragraph1: <0><0>Check your node status</0>, including how many peers you're connected to, your storage and bandwidth stats, and more</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph2: <0><0>View and manage files</0> in your IPFS repo, including drag-and-drop file import, easy pinning, and quick sharing and download options</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph3: <0><0>Explore content</0> with sample datasets and browse IPLD, the data model that underpins content-addressed storage</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph4: <0><0>Browse the peer directory</0> to see connected nodes, verify identities, and manage trust relationships</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph5: <0><0>Review or edit your node settings</0> — no command line required</0>

step1.title: Welcome page
step1.paragraph1: This page lets you know if you're connected to the Space Data Network, and offers ideas for things you can do in this app.
step1.paragraph2: If you aren't connected to the Kubo RPC API, this page also appears in place of some other pages, with hints for how to get connected.
step1.paragraph3: You can visit this page from anywhere in the app by clicking the logo in the navigation bar.
